text:
The org.apache.catalina.loader.Reloader interface is missing from catalina.jar 
in the jakarta-tomcat-4.1.24-LE-jdk1.4.tar.gz distribution. Does not seem to 
affect Tomcat at runtime, but user code that tries to use WebappClassLoader 
cannot compile.
creator: matthew.ring@wamu.net

text:
It's in $CATALINA_HOME/bin/bootstrap.jar. The proper place to ask this type of 
question is on tomcat-user@jakarta.apache.org
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com
